captions.text: Friday - IU
You might be busy on Monday
Tuesday might seem a bit hasty, no?
Wednesday seems to be a little be weird
I just don't like Thursday
This Friday
How is it this Friday?
I can't wait until this weekend
I want to tell the clock to run faster (mind control)
Every minute and second is sweet
What is this man
I can't stop falling in love
During all day, my heart is on those hands of the clock
One stop at a time closer to you
Together
This Friday
How is it this Friday?
There isn't a movie I want to see
There isn't a menu I would like
I can't wait until this weekend
I want to tell the clock to run faster (mind control)
Every minute and second is sweet
What is this man
I can't stop falling in love
During all day, my heart is on those hands of the clock
One stop at a time closer to you
Here we go
I think I'm possessed by something
What is this girl
I can't stop falling in love
I'll see you this Friday
Please take my heart that day

comments.text:
Some of her recent popular songs include Not Spring, Love, or Cherry 
blossom, Sogyeokdong, Red Shoes. Other older hits include Good Day and You 
and I. Her debut song was called Mia which was highly underrated and did 
really badly when she first debuted because it was considered as one of 
those "darker songs" when people were more into the cutesy and poppy songs 
back in 2008. But I would say a lot of her non-title songs are really good 
in her albums as well. I really enjoyed the entire album of her most recent 
album, Modern Times, which I think you should get a chance to listen to. If 
you're interested in her older albums, these are all the ones I can think 
at the top of my head: Good Day, Growing Up, Modern Times, Spring of a 
Twenty Year Old, and Last Fantasy.
